posts.name: Corbin Kuster
posts.cooked: Just went to the Swyft Robotics website to order a RoboRio JST breakout board. This would be our second, since we loved the one we picked up last fall and ran for Reefscape. The website says that specific board is out of stock, and will not be restocked. Have I missed an announcement, or something else? Seems like a great product to me, I’d be unpleasantly surprised if they don’t bring it back

posts.name: Jim Sokoloff
posts.cooked:
This is the last year for the Rio as the controller, so it wouldn’t surprise me if several vendors stopped restocking items that they won’t be able to sell after March or so of 2026.

If you just want hard to disconnect connectors for the “sides” (the PWM and DIO), I made a breakout board for them that worked fine for us and adapted to Phoenix style connectors. Happy to send you the Gerbers, to send you a couple of boards for the cost of postage, or even to whip up a suitable replacement. (It’s not a complex board. )

image 3239×1129 300 KB

image 3239×1129 300 KB

image 3239×1129 300 KB

posts.name: MT
posts.cooked:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. We’re glad to hear you had a great experience with our RoboRio JST breakout board.

We’ve decided to discontinue the product, and it will not be restocked. I’d like to offer some insight into that decision.

The original design dates back to 2017 for the RoboRio V1, and we feel the design is now a bit out of date. The market has also evolved, and there are several other great options available that are better suited for today’s needs. One excellent alternative is the Kitchen Sink RoboRIO JST Adapter . We also are seeing the market moving away from JST and towards a more secure future with Molex.

Another significant factor in our decision is the new control system that will be introduced next season. This would give the current board a very short lifespan, and we didn’t want to sell a product that would soon be obsolete.

link_counts.title: Introducing the KITCHEN SINK (RoboRIO JST Adapter and more)
